name: It's Garbage Day
description:
You can barely contain the excitement as you pull up to your new town for the first time. Normally the sight of vast piles of trash covering the city would be a letdown, but you are the new Town Trash Collector so they mean business.

It's only after several minutes that you realize something odd... The city is nothing BUT trash. Where did all the people go? Well, there are only two things you do know, you are the Town Trash Collector and today is GARBAGE DAY, so it's time to get to work.

Gameplay

Use the arrow keys to move your garbage truck. Garbage truck will pick up items from the right side of the street.
